Posts.Content: Hello everyone, Thank you to those who've alerted us to the PM spamming from earlier today and sincerely apologize about the inconvenience. While we have security measures in place, we can't prevent all spam. We are currently working on measures to try and block this kind of private message spamming. If you received a message from rita44556 prompting you for money, please do not respond, or share any of your information.  This user has been blocked. Going forward, please continue to report any email spammers or questionable behaviors to us.  Kim CSN Support Team
Posts.Title: SCAMMER ALERT!??
